Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

Class TestWalAndCompactingMemStoreFlush

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestWalAndCompactingMemStoreFlush
public class TestWalAndCompactingMemStoreFlush extends Object
This test verifies the correctness of the Per Column Family flushing strategy when part of the memstores are compacted memstores

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes

    private class 
    TestWalAndCompactingMemStoreFlush.ConcurrentPutRunnable
    The in-memory-flusher thread performs the flush asynchronously.
